====Compounds====
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|蛋白|たんぱく}}: [[protein]]; [[egg white]]
* {{ja-r|蛋白質|たんぱくしつ}}: [[protein]]
* {{ja-r|蛋白尿|たんぱくにょう}}: [[albuminuria]]
* {{ja-r|蛋白分解酵素|たんぱく ぶんかい こうそ}}: [[protease]], an [[enzyme]] that breaks down [[protein]]
* {{ja-r|蛋白消化酵素|たんぱく しょうか こうそ}}: [[protease]], an [[enzyme]] that breaks down [[protein]]
* {{ja-r|蛋白石|たんぱくせき}}: [[opal]]
* {{ja-r|蛋民|たんみん}}: the {{w|Tanka people|Tanka ethnic group}} of southern China
{{der-bottom}}

====Usage notes====
Seldom used in Japanese. Not used in isolation.

The {{m|en|egg}} sense and ''tamago'' reading is more commonly spelled either {{m|ja|玉子}} or {{m|ja|卵}}.
